responses: Hi there, what can I do for you?
Hi there, how can I help?
See you later, thanks for visiting
It was pleasure to help you
Thank you for talking to AICTE chat bot

patterns: Where I can find the information related to Approval Process 2020-21
responses: Information related to Approval Process 2020-21 available on AICTE Website's Home page>Quick Links>Approval Process 2020-21

patterns: How can I get New User-id and password (login credentials) for AICTE Web Portal?
responses: Please click on Sign Up link on AICTE Web-portal or go to link http://portal.aicteindia.org/partnerportal_enu. User Manual for Obtaining USERNAME and PASSWORD @https://aicte-india.org/bureaus/approval/ap_2020-21

patterns: I am not able to generate report?
responses: Please refer “User Manual for Report Generation” to generate Reports
You can refer to User Manual for Report Generation
